entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING, Lanaudière
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:39 p.m. EDT Sunday 30 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Rain at times heavy. Low 8.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers early this evening. Rain at times heavy beginning early this evening. Amount 30 to 40 mm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low 8. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Sunday 30 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Rain. High 11.
entry.summary: Rain ending late in the afternoon then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers. Amount 15 to 25 mm. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming southwest 30 gusting to 50 near noon. High 11. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Sunday 30 April 2023
